channel.title: I need help if you will please?
channel.description:
Alright, Ummm I'm sorta new to this. I use to have a server awhile back. But that was on the different computer. I'm curious on how I come to getting a server again.... Like.... Shoot I don't remember anything I'll just post basic Questions.
FIRST, Here is the Type of Computer I have.
Windows Vista 64bit Edition/ HP Pavilion
Now, I want to know the following: Where do I go to Download a Server For myself that shows basically everything on 1 page. Like the Compiler and all that. I do know a bit of Javascript but i must say I'm still in the learning process and Having my own server will help me in the learning.
SO if you could please lend me an ear on what server's I can work with that show what I said above Then please do so.
Thank you. and please answer this as quickly as possible.

item.title: I need help if you will please?
item.dc:creator: @Project_TK Project TK
item.description:
@Project_TK wrote:

[quote=“Wolf_Carmen, post:5, topic:271649”]Ok, now, do i need RAR ow WinRAR? Which is better?[/quote]go to rarlab.com then hit download

Read full topic

item.title: I need help if you will please?

Lol, shady that’s not helping this poor noob… He’s just asking for help. So what, he’s probably never had a server before, but it takes some time to learn these things. No one is born knowing everything.

item.title: I need help if you will please?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Wolf_Carmen, post:1, topic:271649”]Now, I want to know the following:
Where do I go to Download a Server For myself that shows basically everything on 1 page. Like the Compiler and all that.[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Wolf_Carmen:

I do know a bit of Javascript but i must say I’m still in the learning process and Having my own server will help me in the learning.

99.9% of rsps are coded in Java ,not JavaScript. Only one person has bothered to code one in C++.

If your previous system was Windows XP/2000, the process of making and running a server is practically identical.

Read full topic
